about_the_game:
*This is an old project of mine from 2021, upload to Steam as requested
*Demo contains 50% of the game.

The main character is parasitized by tentacles and her breasts slowly turn into vore monsters, so she leaves home to find a cure.
You can choose your own adventure and help some people on the way.
You may also found different costumes on your journey.
Get better gear and skills to help you complete the story.

This game mainly focus on Nipple Vore / Ass Vore / Breast Expansion.
Contains Futanari, Lesbian, Beast scene.

More than 28 Enemies, each with unique aggressive and fallen vore H event.
More than 6 changeable costume for the main character.

Demo contains 50% of the game.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sexual acts, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, interbreed, beastality, body modification, bisexuality, lesbian, etc.
